column4: speaking of sound issues... anyone know if it's possible to get the speaker volume to something reasonable on an eee 1000 with ubuntu on it?  I've cranked up all the sliders I can find
I had a hard time getting decent volume on ANY distro on the eee PCs.
I don't know if this will help you.  http://forum.eeeuser.com/viewtopic.php?id=28023
